Night Shift takes a quick visual log of the panther who skulks off in the o=
ther direction and as fast as he can manage, gets on board the ship. He giv=
es Airhammer a thumbs up.

" We owe ya big time, thanks for the lift."

Rat=
 Trap gets into his seat and quickly gets into the observation systems.

" =
So what the pit's mak'n all that noise out there?  Look'n for thermal reads=
 now.  And Night Shift we got plenty of cats work'n for us now, can't ya se=
ttle for someth'n else like someth'n in the Canine family?"

Night Shift ey=
es Rat Trap.

" No offense but if I'm gonna trade up for a more suitable al=
t form, it's gotta be what I want and what I feel suits me the best.  That =
cat reminds me of myself and who I am.  If that's what I want, I shouldn't =
be questioned about my personal choice."

Rat Trap glares back. 

" But, bu=
t that's the form that Ravage took.  Do ya really wanna be like him?"

Nigh=
t Shift knew the question would come up.  He glares back.

" So that's it. =
 Just because that cat is associated with a Decepticon spy, the species as =
a whole is tainted.  I get the fuss now.  Any of you guys ever thought that=
 sometimes think'n outside the box isn't all that bad sometimes?  C'mon, gi=
mme some slack!  If I want this feline as my alt form it's my choice.  And =
if Tucson was here he'd respect that so please, respect my choices, it's al=
l I ask."

Rat Trap bows his head, crestfallen.

"Ohh, I suppose you're rig=
ht about that.  Wheels wouldn't be so happy with any of us if we didn't lea=
rn ta accept another bots choice, especially one that impacts them long ter=
m."

Night Shift pats Rat Trap on the shoulder.

" Thanks, I know it sounds=
 strange but that's the form that fits me best." 

He turns to Ramulus.

" =
Look I know you're not a fan of the form but, it's my life, my form and my =
choice.  Now I got the visual scan of that big cat.  Where do we go from he=
re?"

His expression remains stern.

Perpetually on the move and constantly=
 busy.
